By poopa on Sunday, February 17, 2002 - 07:11 pm:

Lions by The Black Crowes created in 2001 by V2 Records, Inc. It's an enhanced cd and has a picture of a lion's head with a third eye on its forehead, with all of the colors reversed or inversed or something, but I don't know how to find any other information about it.

Same stats & char as Chrono Cross.
